body_html:
@apaszke Thanks for the reply!
I was using Upsampling1D with same mechanism of UpsamplingNearest2d. I was using Keras before, their Upsampling1D only has this option.
So I need the Upsampling1D with same mechanism of UpsamplingNearest2d. (if Bilinear type is available in the future, I think it would also be helpful.)

Thank you very much!

body:
@apaszke Thanks for the reply!
I was using `Upsampling1D` with same mechanism of `UpsamplingNearest2d`. I was using Keras before, their `Upsampling1D` only has this option.
So I need the `Upsampling1D` with same mechanism of `UpsamplingNearest2d`. (if `Bilinear` type is available in the future, I think it would also be helpful.)

Thank you very much!
